MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the ML2 postcode area of Wishaw. We had no advance warning of this however our engineers have now arrived on site and due to a safety concern on the underground cable network on Muirhouse Avenue, we now need to carry out an emergency shutdown at 12:22am. This may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 7am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:45 AM on Monday, 22 February 2021.
